[event]
# Stairs Up
type=event
location=11,10,3,3
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/perdition_harbor_cave.txt,1,4
soundfx=soundfx/environment/stairs.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Perdition Harbor Cave
unset_status=emp_il_f1

[event]
# Reset Floor
type=event
location=0,0,1,1
activate=on_load
unset_status=emp_il_f1_reset

[event]
# Activate Tele
type=event
location=1,0,1,1
activate=on_load
set_status=emp_il_f1_tele

[event]
# Spawn point: Entrance tele
type=event
location=17,9,1,1
intermap_id=entrance_tele

[event]
# Entrance Tele
type=event
location=18,7,2,2
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/perdition_harbor_cave.txt,-1,-1,obelisk
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/environment/teleporter.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Perdition Harbor Cave
